parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets for how many seconds injured unit leaves blood trail. The unit damage must be ><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 0.1 for this command to have an effect, otherwise, the [[getBleedingRemaining]] will return 0 and no blood trail is left behind.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''setBleedingRemaining''' time

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[setBleedingRemaining]] 60;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setDamage]] 0.25;
[[player]] [[setBleedingRemaining]] 120;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getBleedingRemaining]], [[isBurning]], [[isBleeding]]
</value></part></template>
